name: Mono Rush - 2D Endless Runner
description:
Mono Rush is a 2D endless runner for everyone, available for all popular android versions for FREE. 

Run along random generated, endless running world and explore furthest reaches of the Mono Rush limbo.

Keep yourself alive as long as you can and do not forget to show your best score off to your friends with Google Play Games service.

Earn points and unlock new, dark and fascinating levels of the Mono Rush.

Available levels:

  • Halloween Limbo Nightmare - Run through the dark recesses of an imaginary world in which nothing is normal. Watch out for ghosts, spiders, avoid gaps!
    Sometimes the ground can collapse under your feet, you never know when - so be careful!
  • Wild West - The wildest west of the world is waiting for you!
    Be vigilant! You never know when you'll hit a train full of diamonds. Also less pleasant things are waiting for you, watch out for bridges and trains - they are deadly dangerous!
    Remember to explore the underground.

But... It's just fun so sit back, install Mono Rush for free and have fun!

PLAY FOR FREE NOW!
